DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Estrogen cause growth breast cancer cell . Studying sample blood urine laboratory participant receive freeze-dried table grape powder may help doctor understand effect drug blood estrogen level . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study effect freeze-dried table grape powder blood estrogen level postmenopausal woman .
DOC.brief_title: Studying Effect Freeze-Dried Table Grape Powder Blood Estrogen Levels Postmenopausal Women
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To measure change level plasma estrone ( E1 ) , estradiol , E1-conjugates , E1-sulfates postmenopausal woman 6 week daily ingestion 94 gram freeze-dried table grape powder . - To conduct bioavailability research freeze-dried table grape powder human analysis participant ' blood urine sample . OUTLINE : Participants receive oral freeze-dried table grape powder daily day 1-42 addition usual diet . Treatment continue absence toxicity . Participants undergo blood sample collection baseline , periodically first dose , last day study pharmacokinetic bioavailability analysis . Samples examine mass spectrometry measure plasma level estrone ( E1 ) , estradiol , E1-conjugates , E1-sulfates , testosterone , androstenedione . Participants also undergo spot urine collection weight height measurement periodically study . Participants complete food diary day 1-3 , 21-23 , 40-42 ass intake grape , grape juice , red wine examine constancy caloric intake course study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Participant Mayo Mammography Health Study Has consent provide baseline mammogram digitization PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : ECOG performance status 01 Female Postmenopausal ( define woman ovary remove menstrual period least 12 consecutive month ) Able give inform consent complete food record alone assistance Willing provide research blood urine sample Must nonsmoker Willing maintain current weight No history breast ductal carcinoma situ cancer , except basal cell squamous cell skin cancer lobular carcinoma situ No history allergic adverse reaction grapes No history diabetes glucose intolerance PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : No concurrent hormone therapy , include estradiol , estrone , progestin
